pullrequest.title: Polaris: raise steering wheel, add collision shapes for roll cage and handles

content.raw:
Some questions:
And how you propose to define sufficiently stable? by the rate the robot slides around when everything is otherwise stationary? The mean time until the robot slides off the seat? What solver parameters will you be using to test? 

Our approach is to slide across when seated from the passanger seat. how will the 'mud' effect lateral motion? What time frame do you propose to give the teams to test this approach and to give feedback?

And when will the vehicle be complete? (Some of our team say that its difficult to develop when the vehicle is changing so much)
content.html:
Some questions: And how you propose to define sufficiently stable? by the rate the robot slides around when everything is otherwise stationary? The mean time until the robot slides off the seat? What solver parameters will you be using to test?

Our approach is to slide across when seated from the passanger seat. how will the 'mud' effect lateral motion? What time frame do you propose to give the teams to test this approach and to give feedback?

And when will the vehicle be complete? (Some of our team say that its difficult to develop when the vehicle is changing so much)
